Articles.Content:
So I was listening to music, and was slightly creeped out when I mentally rewrote the lyrics:

My heart's so very cold,

That doesn't mean I got no soul,

I got no friends I am alone, oh oh.

And I will make your ships explode,

You lock me up so you can go,

I send you right back to the start

So sing along to my kraken heart.

But that's as far as I could get. Can the more creative members of the forum finish this off? Bonus points for knowing the song.

I'm usually pretty good with this kind of thing, but unfortunately I'm listening to music right now (Theme from Enterprise at the moment actually; 'Faith of the Heart' ) and I have a great difficulty thinking of different tunes when I'm listening to something. Just keep going back to that. Any clues as to what it is?
Trying to be subtle, I'll just say it involves a stereo.

listen to my stereo heart.

oh-oh-oh-oh-oh

ooh-oh-oh-oh

ooh-oh-oh-oh

listen to mys stereo heart!

I got it, its that 'stereo' song right?

EDIT: Aww, I got Ninja'd. Damn.

EDIT EDIT: I got that without looking at any other posts or that clue of yours, so can I have some bonus points?
